Package wizard

Class WizardManager

java.lang.Object
wizard.WizardManager
public class WizardManager extends Object
Static manager for all the data entered by the user. The protected setup method must be called before operations can be performed.

  • Constructor Details

    • WizardManager

      public WizardManager()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      protected static void setup()
      Initializes the members of the WizardManager class. This method must be called by a package class before other methods can be used.

    • registerEditorEntry

      public static void registerEditorEntry(EditorEntry entry)
      Remembers an editor entry, whose reinitComponent method is called when data tabs are switched.
      Parameters:
      entry - the editor entry to register for reinitialization.

    • notifyEditorEntries

      protected static void notifyEditorEntries(int switchedToIndex)
      Notifies all registered editor entries of a change in data tab. This method also performs validation on all existing data and generates the final json output, if no errors are present.
      Parameters:
      switchedToIndex - the index of the data tab that the user is now viewing.

      the info editor.
